Rule.Reduction:
(no-repeat) (csv "Alert#" "Date" "Zeroday" "Fraud" "Ransomware" "Defacement" "DoS" "Information_Disclosure" "Remote_Code_Execution" "Arbitrary_Code_Execution" "Malware" "Privilege_Escalation" "SQLi" "Trojan" "Phishing" "Brute_Force" "MITM" "Botnet" "Theft" "Cross_Site_Scripting" "Buffer_Overflow" "Path_Traversal")
(newline) (put "0" Zeroday) (put "0" Fraud) (put "0" Ransomware) (put "0" Defacement) (put "0" DoS) (put "0" Information_Disclosure) (put "0" Remote_Code_Execution) (put "0" Arbitrary_Code_Execution) (put "0" Malware) (put "0" Privilege_Escalation) (put "0" SQLi) (put "0" Trojan) (put "0" Phishing) (put "0" Brute_Force) (put "0" MITM) (put "0" Botnet) (put "0" Theft) (put "0" Cross_Site_Scripting) (put "0" Buffer_Overflow) (put "0" Path_Traversal)
(put TTPcode (0 slot1))
(dolist (TTP (0 slot1 -)) (put TTP (0 slot12))
(put "Zeroday" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Zeroday)) (put "Fraud" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Fraud)) (put "Ransomware" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Ransomware)) (put "Defacement" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Defacement)) (put "DoS" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" DoS)) (put "Information_Disclosure" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Information_Disclosure)) (put "Remote_Code_Execution" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Remote_Code_Execution)) (put "Arbitrary_Code_Execution" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Arbitrary_Code_Execution)) (put "Malware" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Malware)) (put "Privilege_Escalation" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Privilege_Escalation)) (put "SQLi" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" SQLi)) (put "Trojan" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Trojan)) (put "Phishing" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Phishing)) (put "Brute_Force" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Brute_Force)) (put "MITM" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" MITM)) (put "Botnet" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Botnet)) (put "Theft" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Theft)) (put "Cross_Site_Scripting" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Cross_Site_Scripting)) (put "Buffer_Overflow" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Buffer_Overflow)) (put "Path_Traversal" (0 slot13)) (when (equal token1: 0 slot1: slot12 token2: 0 slot2: slot13) (put "1" Path_Traversal)) ) (csv alertcode datecode Zeroday Fraud Ransomware Defacement DoS Information_Disclosure Remote_Code_Execution Arbitrary_Code_Execution Malware Privilege_Escalation SQLi Trojan Phishing Brute_Force MITM Botnet Theft Cross_Site_Scripting Buffer_Overflow Path_Traversal)
